vote.title: Authorize the Second Amendment to the 1993 Ground Lease with MLT Development Co. to add approximately 61,149 square feet of land and improvements currently leased by MLT Development Co. on a month-to-month basis and add an additional thirty-four years to the primary term of the lease in consideration for the City’s right of first offer to purchase any portion or all of approximately 175,569 square feet privately-owned land with improvements adjacent to the leasehold - Estimated Revenue: Aviation Fund $11,462,796.50 during the primary term of the lease
